Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Alpha-defensin cryptdin-4 (Defensin-related cryptdin4; Rodents, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Listeria monocytogenes EGD;Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ML-35p, mouse-avirulent Salmonella typhimurium 7953.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Probably contributes to the antimicrobial barrier Function
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Paneth cells of the small bowel.
